item.title: CVE-2022-46821|2024-09-04T17:41:50.424Z -- jackmail%20%26%20sarbacane -- emails%20%26%20newsletters%20with%20jackmail
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Formula Elements in a CSV File vulnerability in Jackmail & Sarbacane Emails & Newsletters with Jackmail.This issue affects Emails & Newsletters with Jackmail: from n/a through 1.2.22.
